attributes.action: repeal any legislation banning the use of metal bullbars on all vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The whole point of a bullbar is to give added protection to the vehicle bodywork. Plastic bullbars add no protection at all.
There is no logic in banning metal bullbars. The vehicle is longer, but if a pedestrian jumps out in front of a vehicle, whether they get hit by the first few (in most cases rounded)inches of the bullbar or by the main body of the vehicle, the injuries will not be any more severe.
